meanings.definition: More showy or flashy in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The dress she wore to the party was glitzier than anything I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The glitzier decorations at the event caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: Her glitzier outfit made her stand out like a shining star among the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The glitzier jewelry sparkled like a thousand tiny stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The glitzier car in the showroom gleamed under the bright lights, drawing admiring glances.

meanings.sent1: The glitzier party had celebrities and fancy decorations everywhere.
meanings.sent2: She always chose the glitzier option when it came to fashion.
meanings.sent3: His glitzier lifestyle seemed like something out of a movie.
meanings.sent4: The glitzier events in town were always full of excitement and luxury.
meanings.sent5: The glitzier hotel in the city was a symbol of wealth and extravagance.
